question:
Recently United States has given a Strategic Trade Authorization-1 (STA-1) status to India. Consider the following statements in this regard:
  1. India is the first country designated with this status
  2. It will reduce the licences barrier in India-US defence trade
Which of the statements given above is/are correct?
explanation: Statement 1 is not correct: US government granted India the status of STA-1 a trading partner equivalent to its closest allies in the NATO. India is now 37th in the list of countries getting this STA-1 status, conferred by USA and 3rd Asian country after Japan and South Korea. Statement 2 is correct: This decision will boost India-US defense trade & will make it easy for India now to get high-technology product, particularly in civil space and defence sectors.
